entry.def: Adherence is the fact of adhering to a particular rule, agreement, or belief.

means.word_mean: 1. faithful support for a religion or cause or political party
2. the property of sticking together (as of glue and wood) or the joining of surfaces of different composition

sentences.en: The teacher demanded adherence to the rules.
sentences.cn: 老师要求学生们遵守纪律。

sentences.en: He was well known for his adherence to the rules.

sentences.en: He gave his adherence to the newly-founded political party.
sentences.cn: 他拥护那个新建的政党。
